item.title: By: Jason Preston
item.dc:creator: Jason Preston
item.description:
It's funny that my subscription runs out for WoW (for at least a few months) in about a week, and in all this time I've never been in the battlegrounds. I've also never been in a serious guild and I've never held a PVP rank higher than Private.
I dunno, I just never took the game seriously enough. I always enjoyed playing WoW (ironically) with more than one person in the room.
Regardless, I certainly hope you get your billing accident.
item.content:encoded:
It’s funny that my subscription runs out for WoW (for at least a few months) in about a week, and in all this time I’ve never been in the battlegrounds. I’ve also never been in a serious guild and I’ve never held a PVP rank higher than Private.

I dunno, I just never took the game seriously enough. I always enjoyed playing WoW (ironically) with more than one person in the room.

Regardless, I certainly hope you get your billing accident.
